mapper.select: select count(1) from t_handle_sign where network_code=#{network} and FROM_UNIXTIME(created_time, '%Y%m')=#{dataFormat}

SELECT count(1) FROM t_handle_third_express_details AS a INNER JOIN t_handle_third_express AS b ON FROM_UNIXTIME(a.created_time, '%Y%m') = #{dataFormat} AND a.third_handle_no = b.handle_no AND a.created_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 86400 * #{dayNum} INNER JOIN t_waybill AS c ON c.order_no = a.order_no WHERE COALESCE ( c.next_network_id, b.network_code ) = #{network} AND ( SELECT count(1) FROM t_handle_sign AS e WHERE e.order_no = a.order_no ) = 0

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(a.created_time, '%d') AS day, COUNT(1) AS count FROM t_handle_sign AS a INNER JOIN t_waybill b ON a.order_no = b.order_no WHERE a.network_code = #{network} AND a.created_time < #{toTime} and a.created_time > #{fromTime} GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(a.created_time, '%d')
SELECT count(DISTINCT order_no) FROM t_waybill_log_arrive WHERE network_id = #{network} and FROM_UNIXTIME(created_time, '%Y%m')=#{dataFormat}
